basics.name: naeem akhtar
basics.technologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, WordPress, PHP, MySql, Angular 2+, Photoshop, CorelDraw

about.summary: With over 10 years of combined experience in Web Development and Designing, I have worked in the Digital Marketing and Information Technology domain.
highlights: Skilled in developing UI using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, SASS, and responsive designs
Skilled in hand-coding, implementing code and troubleshooting cross browser compatibility issues
Improve accessibility of applications using markup integrated with backend technologies
Thorough subject knowledge, strong analytical and troubleshooting skills with an ability to perform in challenging environments
Good experience in Wordpress, PHP, MySQL, Git, Jira
Have good verbal and written communication skills

experience.summary: Solely responsible for creating, maintaining WordPress site of the company. Managed and updated for marketing team. Designed and developed using custom PHP codes, created custom ACF blocks using ACF plugin.
